review: Works great whenever it works. Plex and Netflix app are awesome.I can go days working wonderfully with the device, but some days it just cannot connect.Even though I'm 15 feet away from a 105Mbps down wireless connection I still get network errors. No other WiFi device I have gives me problems but this. I am hoping an update will help resolve the issues I have. Due to the issues I have now, I will not be purchasing another one, even though it works great when it works, I don't like dealing with the problems that occur sometimes.
author: Billy P.
